name: Bristol Mandarin Chinese Meetup
description: A group for Mandarin and English learners to practice conversation. We organize various activities like meals and drinks, welcoming everyone, whether you're just starting Chinese or are a fluent speaker.
details: Please try to RSVP on Meetup as we often book tables, but feel free to join last minute if the event is an informal gathering without a booking. A small contribution (e.g. Â£2 cash or via WeChat Pay/PayPal) is appreciated at events to help cover Meetup's monthly fees and keep the group running.
